title: Internet
content:
In my 18 years of living I have never experienced such regular disappointment from anything or anyone except from myself and the boys hostel WiFi connectivity ( 1st year AMAATRA) 

This WiFi is so ass it literally fails to fuckitn load ads without buffering ;main problem with this Dogshit is that it randomly suicides for 5 minutes every 5 minutes so itâ€™s basically useless and for some reason I donâ€™t even get mobile data the second I enter this shithole 
Hostel so I have to depend on the WiFi 

This garbage cannot even play a 5 minute video on 480p from start to finish without dying itâ€™s so trash man plus they keep changing the password process whatever but that doesnâ€™t fix shit the WiFi is still horrible 

I know hostel WiFi isnâ€™t supposed to be good but my friends in other hostels have decent WiFiâ€™s which can easily support basic internet facilities but this piece of worthless junk cannot play a fucking reel 

We literally have online classes on weekends and if someone decides to stay in hostel in those days all they gonna hear in the class is broken ass voice which sounds like the worst sequence of guitar strings because of this WiFi

comments.body: I was in the girls hostel there for 2 years and the wifi was an never ending problem. The warden was also a massive bitch who refused to acknowledge the million complaints people raised about it, she told us we need to learn to stay away from our laptops lmao. Never want to visit that shithole again in my life.
not to mention they block every site lmao , like they even blocked [chess.com](http://chess.com) ðŸ’€

Warden G.. rightâ€¦ ?? damnn the wifi, the washing machine, the curfew, the dont talk to boys, dont remind me all thatðŸ¥²ðŸ¥²ðŸ¥²
Yes it was G****. Horrible woman.

Yes it was G****. Truly horrid woman. Still remember how my brother visited me one time and she misunderstood and berated me for "talking to boys"ðŸ˜‚ never understood her obsession with the washing machine either
Use your mobile data. Apparently PES is anti fun.
